mapper.select: SELECT c.*, (SELECT u.nick_name FROM `user` u WHERE u.user_id = c.user_id) AS sender_name, (SELECT u.avatar_url FROM `user` u WHERE u.user_id = c.user_id) AS sender_avatar_url FROM `comment` c WHERE c.recipe_id = #{commentDto.recipeId} AND c.root_id IS NULL

SELECT c.*, s.nick_name AS sender_name, s.avatar_url AS sender_avatar_url, s.user_id AS sender_id, r.nick_name AS receiver_name, r.avatar_url AS receiver_avatar_url, r.user_id AS receiver_id FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user s ON c.user_id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN user r ON c.to_id = r.user_id WHERE c.recipe_id = #{commentDto.recipeId} AND c.root_id = #{commentDto.rootId}
